name: Hotel Avalon

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: If you are going to book a room at Avalon hotel - don't take ones facing 13. Janvara street, I mean entrance. Rooms are very good, but too noisy, because the trams are passing by every 10-20 minutes from as early as 5AM and street itself got quite a busy traffic. Rooms on the opposite side do not have any nice view - you will only enjoy viewing some construction works or rooftops, but they are nice and quiet. I started my review from contras, but that doesn't mean you will not enjoy your stay at Avalon. Rooms are very reasonably priced, so the value is just great. Location is another pro - Avalon is located on the edge of Old Riga. Enjoy it!
reviews.title: Noisy, but there is an escape

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Avalon hotel is situated nicely at the edge of the old town. Riga is so small you can walk everywhere. Hotel looks nice on the outside and on the inside, but the rooms aren't so good you might think . The rooms are still nice and clean. The rooms have air-conditioning, which is quite loud so take earplugs if you cannot stand its noise in the summer.
reviews.title: Good hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled with family
reviews.text: The breakfast is excellent, but I got concerned about the mayonnaise standing on a table and not being cooled down.. There is hot sausages, scrambled eggs, fruit, bread, something sweet, etc.
reviews.title: Excellent. The best in Riga !

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2011, traveled with friends
reviews.text: This is a nice hotel, and I could come back again.
reviews.title: A very nice Christmas

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Also we needed to stay over-night, but had a bit more time. Hotel itself is new or well maintained.
reviews.title: Modern hotel, friendly staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2007, traveled with family
reviews.text: On one of my frequent visits to Riga I decided to try out the new an modern Avalon Hotel at the edge of the Old Town, right across the Train Station and Central Market. From the outside, the building itself is cold and uninviting, somehow not fitting into the silhouette of the Old Town.
reviews.title: Not bad, BUT....

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2007, traveled on business
reviews.text: Location is as good as any Old Town Hotel, everything is just steps away (I can highly recommend the Restaurant Pomodoro just around the corner from the hotel - THE best pizzas on the globe!). The lobby is nice and modern, but also rather cold. A nice touch is the 'outside' elevator with nice views over the atrium lobby.
reviews.title: New Hotel. Great location for old town, city centre, market, bus station and tra

likes.disliked: — Shower head kept falling down and maitenance staff could not fix it.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Perfectly situated near the railway and bus station, and from the back entrance you get directly out in the old town. Comfortable air conditioned rooms. Free wellfunctioning wireless internet. Breakfast not that impressive, but adequate and quite OK. Price moderate.
reviews.title: Comfortable hotel, conveniently situated

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Our room was clean, nice and modern. Two minus: the windows of our room pointed to lobby and reception, and there were not a pillow "menu" (pillows were very hard and thin). Free wifi worked well. The breakfast was not special but ok. The service was great. I really recommend the snacks of the lobby bar (spring rolls, club sandwiches etc.)
reviews.title: Nice and modern hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Hotel location was great, 8. floor room was small but nice view to railway and river Daugava.
reviews.title: Nice hotel and good location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled with family
reviews.text: Beds are very hard and i feel strings in my back.
reviews.title: Spectacular place!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Breakfast (7-11 )was good, but normal coffee ends 9.00
reviews.title: Good hotel, yet unproffesional staff/policies

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2011, traveled on business
reviews.text: Was there in november 2011 on a business seminar.
reviews.title: Looks fancy, is really not anything special

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Rooms were okay, but nothing more than okay. Bathroom looked nice at first view, but on further inspection you could see the cracks, and the marks. Had a nice deep bathtub, but the shower had no water pressure what so ever, which made it very difficult to rinse out shampoo from hair when showering.
reviews.title: Highly recommended

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled with friends
reviews.text: Room had iron, minibar (with only drinks, no snacks) and phone. WIFI was free and worked as it should all through the stay¨.
reviews.title: Great Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The biggest let-down was the food. Breakfast was okay, had some good choice, pancakes and fruit was a plus.
reviews.title: Great choice

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011
reviews.text: Lunch and dinner on the other hand was terrible, old potatoes, poor selection of food, dry meat.. will definately suggest to have these meals outside the hotel.
reviews.title: This hotel is clean, very central and easy to get to from Riga airport.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled with family
reviews.text: Excellent location for exploring, very close to airport bus connection (cost 5 Lats- £6.50). Good quality rooms and service, with an exceptional breakfast choice served from 7 til 11 a.m.
reviews.title: Ed

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled on business
reviews.text: Good hotel, very convenient location – on the edge of beautiful Old Town and some 5 min walk from Riga central train and bus stations. Rooms are nice and well equipped. Sound proof windows protect from any noise on nearby busy street . We had nice dinner at hotel’s restaurant at very modest prices. Next time in Riga will definitely stay at this hotel again.
reviews.title: Very good hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The location of the hotel is very good as the airport bus stop is about 3 mins walking distance. The central station is also close by while the hotel is just at the edge of the old town.
reviews.title: Good centralised location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We loved our stay here....clean and modern.....it was very convenient to the bus station and train transportation and we could walk to all the major sites. Breakfast was excellent and our room was pleasant and large. On our trip we stayed in 9 hotels and this was one of the top two.
reviews.title: One of the best hotels of our trip

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled solo
reviews.text: Ended up booking this as part of my flight with AirBaltic without doing much research. Was very pleasantly surprised by how nice it was, how friendly and chatty the staff were, the location which and the room. Unfortunately I wasn't there long so didn't get around to trying the breakfast (sleep seemed more appealing) or the balcony beer garden near the roof and can't comment but based on everything else can recommend it.
reviews.title: pleasant and well situated

description: Located in the historical part of the Riga – Old Town – the Avalon hotel offers the unique opportunity to enjoy the Middle Ages charm and elegance of the city combined with modernism and comfort. The new four-star Avalon represents the combination of modernity and antiqueness with the full reflect of the New life in the Old Town. The panorama elevator will let you feel this special atmosphere in the Atrium of the hotel. With a view of commercial and shopping center, Daugava River, the old town churches and towers the Avalon hotel is ideal place for tourists and business persons.
